long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Play Catan like a PRO on colonist.io!

Take your gameplay to the next level with the most powerful game-tracking browser extension.
Packed with advanced features, this tool provides real-time insights to help you dominate the board.

Incredible Features:
- 🃏 Track Cards Like Never Before: Monitor each player's resource and development cards, plus the bank’s inventory.
- 🎲 Dice Roll Statistics: Analyze roll probabilities and trends to make smarter decisions.
- 🤖 Smart Probability Calculations: Predict most-likely outcomes of unknown robberies.

Comprehensive Support & Customization:
- 🗺️ Play any map and most game modes (Cities & Knights coming soon).
- 🌍 Track games in English, Spanish, and Russian (more in future).
- ⚙️ Customize tracking options to suit your play style.
- 🛑 Turn the extension on or off whenever you like.
- 🚫 Remove in-game ads for uninterrupted gameplay.

Ready to elevate your Catan strategy? 
Download now and gain the competitive edge you’ve been looking for!
